response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential worth to me, but I am confident it could bring unparalleled benefits to someone like yourself. I am offering this product to you for a special consideration of $650,000. This price reflects my desire to share its value with someone who can appreciate it fully. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you are interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 650000}
